committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to establish a lifetime limit of $100,000 on the amount of deposit insurance any person may obtain.

summary.text: Federal Deposit Insurance Reform Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to mandate a lifetime maximum amount of insurance of $100,000 on insured deposits.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to establish a lifetime limit of $100,000 on the amount of deposit insurance any person may obtain.
